title: State of Decay 2 E3 2016 Trailer - Kinda Funny Reacts
description:
Subscribe for all your E3 2016 updates! https://www.youtube.com/c/kindafunnygames?sub_confirmation=1

Greg and Tim breakdown the State of Decay 2 E3 2016 Trailer!

Follow us on Twitter!
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy

transcript_chunks.text: E3 2016 is happening Kinda Funny is going all out with Let's Plays and reaction videos all week long subscribe now at youtube.com/kindafunnygames to not miss a thing what's up guys I'm happy State of Decay 2 is this your go-to happy dance I appreciate that it's a happy dance what do you want to do I wasn't sure where the mic was I'm happy that you're happy you know that's what E3 is about Tim Gettys Greg Miller E3 here we go beautiful right here yeah you know what I'm saying it's back people it's multiplayer Undead Labs back at it so excited State of Decay is criminally underrated criminally underplayed they put it out on Xbox One in that complete edition if you haven't played it go play it right now if you don't own an Xbox One buy that slim and then the first thing you get is State of Decay watch our Let's Plays youtube.com/kindafunnygames yeah don't mock my speech pattern all right it was good okay good I don't have much to add here Greg you're
